trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The hot-blooded storekeeper and her trusty alpaca gaze at you inquisitively.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_TODO_00<tab>Search for the malodorous coffee bean thief.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the malodorous coffee bean thief.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_TODO_02<tab>Retrieve the sack of stolen coffee beans.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the sack of stolen coffee beans to the hot-blooded storekeeper.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_000<tab>Hmm... Interesting. My darling Alpy didn't spit at your approach.

TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_001<tab>Which can only mean she trusts you! And if she does, then so do I! As such... I would ask a favor. Recently, a sack of premium coffee beans was stolen from our storehouse.

TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_002<tab>The thieves came in the dead of night, but I was wide awake to catch them in the act─a band of Hoobigo mercenaries. My brave Alpy spat on their leader square in the face, and thanks to her saliva's distinctive scent, I was able to track them down.

TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_003<tab>They were well armed, however, so I resolved to give up on the coffee beans. But for a strapping <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((fellow)) /var> like you, contending with those thieves shouldn't be a problem! So please, I beg you─go to Oruncanca, and teach them a lesson!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_004<tab>You'll find the coffee bean thieves in Oruncanca. Please go there and teach them a lesson!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_STINKINGMAMOOLJA05036_000_010<tab><retch> Urgh... The smell! I can't get rid of the smell!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_STINKINGMAMOOLJA05036_000_011<tab>What!? Who are yo─ <heave> Gah! I've had it up to here today! Boys, get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_BALOON_000_012<tab>Smells worse than shit!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_BALOON_000_013<tab>I'm gonna kill you, then that alpaca!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_STINKINGMAMOOLJA05036_000_015<tab>B-Boys...? Damn you! You'll regret this!
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_020<tab>You're returned! And you look none the worse for wear. What a relief.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_021<tab>Ah, our precious coffee beans! Thank you so, so much! I knew I could trust you.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_022<tab>Coffee's popularity continues to soar, as does the demand for it. I'm afraid incidents like this one have grown increasingly more common.
TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_023<tab>Everyone's been pouring their hearts into this, to make the most delicious coffee possible and give the mate tea farms a run for their money.

TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_024<tab>And yet those thieves tried to steal the very fruit of our labors! Bad apples, the lot of them! And you know a bad apple when you see one, don't you, Alpy? They <var 1A 02 /var>deserve<var 1A 01 /var> to be spat on! <ptooey>

TEXT_KINGZB007_05036_GUARDPELUPELU05036_000_025<tab>Oh, sorry about that! I got a little carried away. But I've taken up enough of your time. Here─a little something for your troubles. And the spittle...
